message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor to account for the higher inflation I'm facing.

Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I understand the inflation disparity, but let's find a more balanced agreement. I propose a 52/48 split, acknowledging the inflation you face while ensuring fairness for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your understanding of the inflation difference.  I'm willing to meet closer to the middle. How about a 51/49 split? This acknowledges the time pressure we both face.
